duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform routine preventative and predictive maintenance on all plant equipment, including troubleshooting complicated issues.
Directly supervise day-to-day activity of a team of Solar Technicians, providing technical advice and support.
Study and qualify on all systems within a Geothermal and Solar Power Plant.
Operate plant equipment in accordance with standard operating procedures.
Support LOTO on equipment and systems that an official qualification has been completed.
Ensure safe operation of plant heavy equipment, such as man lifts and forklifts.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED (Plant operations qualifications program completion required)
